# Resfinder results

[Resfinder](https://cge.cbs.dtu.dk/services/ResFinder/) is a database that hosts acquired antimicrobial resistance genes and chromosomal mutations. This database has been queryed through BLASTx with the query predicted protein sequences.

```{r resfinder-resistance-pattern}
resistance_summary %>%
  filter(str_detect(source, pattern = "resfinder"))
```
